snippet: Gunfire erupted at a confrontation between supporters of President Hugo Chávez and his main rival, Henrique Capriles Radonski.
abstract: At least two supporters of Venezuelan opposition candidate Henrique Capriles Radonski are shot to death in confrontation with supporters of President Hugo Chavez, raising tensions as the presidential campaign enters its final week.
lead_paragraph: Gunfire erupted at a confrontation between supporters of President Hugo Chávez and his main rival, Henrique Capriles Radonski.

headline.seo: 2 Backers of Chávez’s Rival Are Killed in Venezuela
headline.main: 2 Supporters of a Challenger Are Killed as Venezuela’s Election Nears
headline.print_headline: 2 Supporters of a Challenger Are Killed as Venezuela’s Election Nears
